attributes.action: Scrap TV lisence as people in Spain etc. watch it yet don't pay the £139 fee!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe it's an infringement of not only our human rights but is a monopoly to which we have no choice to opt out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
